messages.text: :slack-on-fire: :grapes: Slack recently broke the emoji reaction picker for me, at least until it loaded the emoji once or so? I enter the exact name and then it just resets the list as if I hadn't typed anything just before I click, so I end up clicking on some random emoji instead of the one I searched for

I enter the exact name and then it just resets the list as if I hadn't typed anything just before I click, so I end up clicking on some random emoji instead of the one I searched for

messages.text: and now it has two scroll bars in there: <https://files.internetwolke.ovh/2020/12/LQnMK65UGv.mp4>

messages.text: Hardly qualifies as a gripe, but what's up with the slack android app regularly showing me a notification about "switching language settings"? Seems to be related to screen rotation

elements.text: Hardly qualifies as a gripe, but what's up with the slack android app regularly showing me a notification about "switching language settings"? Seems to be related to screen rotation

messages.text:
That bug has existed for like 2 years or so, it's really annoying

I have my screen rotation locked and still see that message frequently :shrug:
